Detailed Description

CustomData represents custom data storage class.

This class used to store custom data exported from DragonTool.

Member Data Documentation

Int data
 

Custom data value.

See data_types for type of value.

Word data_type
 

Data types for variable data.

It can to have values: 0 - data is a pointer to string of const Char*. Use data casting (const Char*)data. 1 - data is a 32 bit integer valuy of type Int. 2 - data is a fixed point valuy of type Fixed. 3 - data is a 16 bit short integer valuy of type Short. 4 - data is a boolean valuy of type Bool.

Word token
 

Token id identifier.

Set by ExportNode() to equal token name string number in tokens array.
